author: teresabell
title: One of the best in the locality
text: We were welcomed in a friendly yet professional manner at reception. Our room was newly refurbished to a high standard, and although the room was on the small size it was beautifully appointed. The room was extremely hot on our arrival and we couldn't operate the air conditioning, a phone call to reception was followed almost immediately with a service operator at our door. He quickly sorted the problem out and was very pleasant. Having stayed previously at the Holiday Inn and the Marriott in the same locality, this would be the hotel we would return to and recommend to our friends.
